oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Battle Re-Creation at the Union City Fairgrounds by Veterans

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Soldiers; Fairs
Soldiers; Fairs; Battles
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Group of people viewing a battle reenactment performed by veterans at the Union City Fairgrounds.
Among the Confederate veterans taking part in the re-creation was Captain John W. Morton. A vivid description of this event was reprinted in the Union City Daily Messanger, July 2, 1976.
